Texts.Chs: 激动。我们被另一波围攻了！他们派出了更多的步兵和更多的弓箭手，而且……不！他们在天空！那些紫色的疯子们已经飞了起来！
Texts.Eng: Agitated. We are besieged by another wave! They've sent more infantry, and more archers, and... No! They're in the skies! Those purple curs have taken to the air!

Texts.Chs: 谨慎。没了吗你还好吗如果不见了，我需要和你谈谈。
Texts.Eng: Cautious. Is it gone? Are you intact? If it's gone I need to talk to you.

Texts.Chs: 绝望。没有其他的古代武器！解放城堡！我甚至还没有发现它的最大秘密！
Texts.Eng: Desperate. Not another ballista! Save the keep! I haven't even uncovered its greatest secrets yet!

Texts.Chs: 你好？是我。很抱歉，但是——还有更多的邪教徒正在前来。请不要担心，我们将帮助您！我只是侥幸存活，但是其他人都倒下了！
Texts.Eng: Hello? It's me. I'm sorry but - there are more cultists coming. Please don't worry though; we're going to help! I'd just get in the way, but the others are coming down!

Texts.Chs: 喜庆。哈哈！他们真是自作自受！我们解决了这些蛆虫中的最后一个！我会唱歌！过来，我想为你唱一首...
Texts.Eng: Jubilant. Ha ha! That's done for them! We got every last one of those wretched maggots! I could sing! Come here, I want to speak to you...

Texts.Chs: 愤怒。我没事，但你必须摧毁那个古代武器！我不能失去我的收藏和研究！
Texts.Eng: Outraged.The brigands have rolled in a war machine! I won't have my keep obliterated, you must destroy that ballista! I won't lose my collection or my research!

Texts.Chs: 惊慌失措。 古代武器！还有巨兽！我美丽的墙壁！我的^green;古代遗物^reset;！快来保护我的^green;古代遗物^reset;！
Texts.Eng: Panicked. The ballista! And Mega-Fauna! My beautiful walls! And my ^green;artifacts^reset;! Protect my beautiful ^green;artifacts^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 又是你？你为什么总是反对我们？你的决心被^red;它们^reset;活活浪费了。无论如何，非要反对我们的话，就与其他人同归于尽吧。男爵！我们为^red;古代遗物^reset;而来！交给我！
Texts.Eng: You again? Why do you oppose us? Your mind is wasted with ^red;them^reset;. No matter. Oppose us, and die with the rest. ^red;BARON! WE'RE HERE FOR THE ^orange;ARTIFACT^reset;! HAND IT OVER!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 无论你再怎么尝试，有或没有古代遗物，你都不会停止^red;觉醒^reset;，这无可避免。我们会再次见面的，你这愚蠢的家伙，下一次，就是你的死期。
Texts.Eng: You will not stop the ^red;Awakening^reset; no matter how hard you try. With or without the artifact, it is inevitable. We'll meet again, you fool! And next time, you will die.
